titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Oak Grove Cemetery of Dixboro records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Oak Grove Cemetery of Dixboro records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: The Oak Grove Cemetery Company of Dixboro, Mich., was organized February 24, 1860.
archdesc.scopecontent: Record book containing indentures for burial lots, 1864-1992; annual meeting minutes, 1877-1970; plot maps (in oversize folder); brief history; by-laws and articles of association; and legal and financial documents.
